title: SetSessionConfigAspectValidateSourceAddress (Method)
text:
METHOD SetSessionConfigAspectValidateSourceAddress :
Error
Set optional outstation session configuration aspect - validate source address.

rows.Name: validateSourceAddress
rows.Comment:
Specify whether or not to validate source address in received
frames. DNP3 frames contain both a source address field and a
destination address field. If TMWDEFS_FALSE the TMW DNP3 SCL does not
validate the source address and frames whose destination address
matches a configured Outstation session will be accepted.
Setting this to TRUE requires both source and destination
addresses to match a local Outstation session before the frame is accepted.
